resources.string: Storage permission is needed to read video file from your phone, ignore this if you don\'t store video on your phone
Overlay permission is needed to display danmaku, danmaku window is on the top of player window, and follow player window\'s state to show/hide
Accessibility service is needed to get MX Player\'s state, video duration, pause button click, etc

Enable this and choose \"MX Danmaku\" when open video file from file explorer, we need to know file name and calculate file hash to match danmaku (service provided by DanDanPlay), you\'ll be redirect to MX Player instatly
In MX Player settings -> Player -> Interface -> Controls -> Interface auto hide, this seconds must not too small, or danmaku can\'t be create/sync correctly\n4s or higher is advised
